official-title.#text:
To require express prior statutory authorization from
		  Congress to carry out any activities under the United States–Afghanistan
		  Strategic Partnership Agreement, and for other purposes.

sponsor.#tail:
introduced
			 the following bill; which was referred to the

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: to carry out such activities for such fiscal year.

text.#text:
The United States Government may not carry
			 out any activities under the United States–Afghanistan Strategic Partnership
			 Agreement, signed on May 2, 2012, and went into effect on July 4, 2012, or any
			 successor agreement, for any fiscal year that begins on or after the date of
			 the enactment of this Act absent express prior statutory authorization from

header.#text:
Express prior statutory
			 authorization to carry out activities under the United States–Afghanistan
			 Strategic Partnership Agreement

{http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/}title.#text: 113 HR 2176 IH: To require express prior statutory authorization from Congress to carry out any activities under the United States–Afghanistan Strategic Partnership Agreement, and for other purposes.
